text: Ezɨma gumazir mam, an ziam Jairus, a God ko mɨgeir dɨpenimɨn gumazir dapanim. An guivir vamɨra an azenir 12 plan boroghɨra ghugha, aremeghasava ami. Kamaghɨn a iza Iesusɨn dagaribar apengan irɨ. Egha uan dɨpenimɨn mangasa Iesus gakaghori. Ezɨ Iesus ghuavɨra itima maburan avɨrim bar anekuvagha anedughadusi.(8:42) An guivir vamɨra, a 12 plan azenibar boroghɨra ghu, kamaghɨn amizɨ e ghaze, an azenir 12 plan boroghɨra ghu.
